channel.title: hitBooleen
channel.description:
With Specials We have the hitbooleen2 or Something, Were it make the wepon hit 2 times.
i Was wondering if someone can help me make a code to make a sword hit 4 times WITHOUT SPECIAL just hits 4 times and actually hits 4 times with SOME 0's.

item.title: hitBooleen
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Well find the DDS special and find where it calls the DDS to hit twice, copy the code and rename it, and instead of 2 make it hit four, then where it asks for the attack animation of the weapon paste the hit four times code.

Read full topic
